lom:description.lom:string:
This web-based software teaches the user concepts about physics of the earth. The software is divided into the following topics: - Relative Plate Motions - Triple Junction Stability - Spherical Triangles - Geomagnetism - Vector Differential Operators - Example Vector Differential Operators - Heat Equation Notation - Heat Equation with Time-Periodic Boundary - Basic Elasticity Theory - A Sample Strain Tensor - Wave Equations for Organ and Guitar - P- and S-Wave Potentials - Snell's Law - Sample Earthquake Focal Mechanisms - Gravity Field Continuation - Complex and Hypercomplex Numbers
This software was originally cataloged at http://www.my-edu2.com/eduframe.htm.

lom:title.lom:string: Physics of the Earth: Integrated Science Program
